tools.title: FitText
tools.desc: FitText makes font-sizes flexible. Use this plugin on your fluid or responsive layout to achieve scalable headlines that fill the width of a parent element.

tools.title: Font Combiner
tools.desc: Free custom web fonts and SVG icons. A versatile web font creator and font improvement tool exposing advanced font features to the end user, including kerning, subsetting, various hinting options and custom font glyph combinations.

tools.title: Font Flame
tools.desc: Font Flame is Tinder for font pairing.

tools.title: Font Pair
tools.desc: Font Pair helps designers pair Google Fonts together. Beautiful Google Font combinations and pairs.

tools.title: Font Squirrel
tools.desc: Font Squirrel scours the internet for high quality, legitimately free fonts. Download thousands of completely legal, high quality, free fonts.

tools.title: Font-To-Width
tools.desc: Font‑To‑Width (FTW!) is a script that takes advantage of large type families to fit pieces of text snugly within their containers.

tools.title: Fontface Ninja
tools.desc: Fontface Ninja is a plugin you can install in your browser to recognize, try and buy any fonts on the Internet.

tools.title: Fontic
tools.desc: Fontic scans PSD file for fonts.

tools.title: FontReach
tools.desc: FontReach scans the top million sites to show font usage across the web.

tools.title: Fonts In Use
tools.desc: A searchable archive of typographic design, indexed by typeface, format, and industry.

tools.title: Fontstand
tools.desc: Fontstand allows trying fonts for free or renting them by the month for desktop use for just a fraction of the regular price.

tools.title: Google Fonts
tools.desc: Google Fonts is an interactive directory of free hosted application programming interfaces for web fonts.

tools.title: Modularscale
tools.desc: Modularscale provides calculator to produce set of harmonious proportions for your typographic setting: type sizes, line height, line length, margins, column widths, and more.

tools.title: Prototypo
tools.desc: Prototypo is an online app that enables anyone to customize their own typeface in a few clicks.

tools.title: Readable
tools.desc: Readable is a jQuery plugin to help you create optimally sized paragraphs for maximum readability.

tools.title: RightFont
tools.desc: Use RightFont to preview, sync, install, and manage fonts on your Mac or Dropbox/Google Drive. Add font organization functionality for Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Sketch, etc.

tools.title: SkyFonts
tools.desc: Install fonts from various participating sites. Fonts are installed from the cloud on your computer fast and easily.

tools.title: Typ.io
tools.desc: Typ.io is source of inspiration for fonts that go together.

tools.title: Type Anything
tools.desc: Type Anything is tool to create and test font combinations for your projects. It also lets you download the CSS code.

tools.title: Type Detail
tools.desc: Type Detail is a project by Wenting Zhang, pointing out the beautiful details of the typefaces that one often takes for granted.

tools.title: Type Nugget
tools.desc: Type Nugget is an online CSS typesetting tool that gives you fine control over a robust base for hella fine web type.

tools.title: Type Sample
tools.desc: Type Sample is a tool for identifying and sampling webfonts.

tools.title: Type Scale
tools.desc: Type Scale lets you preview and choose the right type scale for your project, experiment with font size, scale and different webfonts.

tools.title: Typecast
tools.desc: Typecast is a free design tool for prototyping web type, web pages, and RWD.

tools.title: TypeKit
tools.desc: Typekit is a service which allows designers and developers to use high-quality fonts in their work through a subscription plan to their font library.

tools.title: Typetester
tools.desc: Typetester is an online tool for comparing and designing with web fonts.

tools.title: Typewolf
tools.desc: Typewolf helps designers choose the perfect font combination for their next design project. It features web fonts in the wild, font recommendations and learning resources.

tools.title: WebFonter
tools.desc: WebFonter lets you try web fonts from FontShop on any website.

tools.title: What the Font
tools.desc: What the Font helps you identify font in the wild by scanning uploaded image.
